quotes: during the 1990s he served as the Chief Environmental Adviser to the President and to the Director of the Environment Department at the World Bank
He joined the Global Environment Facility (GEF) in its pilot phase in 1991 as Chairman
led the GEF as CEO and Chairman from 1994 to 2003
as Special Adviser to the Secretary General of the 1992 U.N. Conference on Environment and Development (UNCED)
